NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Our terms and conditions are available on our website
Dear Parent/ Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
When you originally signed our consent statement, we told you that we would send you terms and conditions once they became available. We are writing to let you know that our terms and conditions are now available on our website. Terms and conditions make up part of the consent that you provided when applying for {!Contact.Name} to take part in NCS with The Challenge.
You can find a copy of our consent statement by clicking here: http://ncsthechallenge.org/component/content/article/41-ncs-bottom/129-consent-statement
You can find a copy of our terms and conditions by clicking here: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/terms
Terms and conditions may change – please check our website for the most up-to-date version.
Please note that this update does not affect the status of your application.
If you have any questions, you can email us at contact@the-challenge.org or call us on 0203 542 2400.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter - Director at The Challenge
